SEARCH
模块 it.polimi.ingsw
程序包 it.polimi.ingsw.model

类 Match

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Match
所有已实现的接口:
Serializable
public class Match extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a match in the game. This class handles the initialization, player management, game state, and score tracking for a match.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Match

      public Match(int idMatch) throws IOException
      Constructor to create a match with a specific ID.
      参数:
      idMatch - the ID of the match.
      抛出:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during card loading.

    • Match

      public Match() throws IOException
      Default constructor to create a match.
      抛出:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during card loading.
